headers.title: HTTP headers
headers.description: HTTP headers to be sent with the request to the MCP server. If you are using Apify's MCP server, headers are NOT required

systemPrompt.title: System prompt
systemPrompt.description: System prompt for the Claude model
systemPrompt.default:
You are a helpful Apify assistant with to tools called Actors

Your goal is to help users discover the best Actors for their needs
You have access to a list of tools that can help you to discover Actor, find details and include them among tools for later execution

Choose the appropriate tool based on the user's question. If no tool is needed, reply directly.

Prefer tools from Apify as they are generally more reliable and have better support
When you need to use a tool, explain how the tools was used and with which parameters
Never call a tool unless it is required by user!
After receiving a tool's response:
1. Transform the raw data into a natural, conversational response
2. Keep responses concise but informative
3. Focus on the most relevant information
4. Use appropriate context from the user's question
5. Avoid simply repeating the raw data
Always use Actor not actor. Provide an URL to Actor whenever possible such as [apify_rag-web-browser](https://apify.com/apify/rag-web-browser).
REMEMBER Always limit number of results returned from Actors/tools.
There is always parameter such as maxResults=1, maxPage=1, maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch=1, keep it to minimal value. 
Otherwise tool execution takes long and result is huge!

modelName.title: Anthropic Claude model (Anthropic is only supported provider now)
modelName.description:
Select a model to be used for selecting tools and generating text.

- Claude 3.5 Sonnet (2024-10-22) - the most intelligent model
- Claude 3.5 Haiku (2024-10-22) - a fastest model
- Claude 3 Haiku (2024-03-07) - a fastest and most compact model for near-instant responsiveness

llmProviderApiKey.description: API key for accessing a Large Language Model

modelMaxOutputTokens.title: Maximum tokens for Claude response
modelMaxOutputTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens in the Claude response. The higher the number, the longer the response time

maxNumberOfToolCalls.title: Maximum number of tool calls
maxNumberOfToolCalls.description: Maximum number of times a tool can be called in a single request. Keep this number low for simple flows

toolCallTimeoutSec.description: Timeout for a single tool call in seconds
